text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1650. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The trackpad is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Lenovo Legion Y545 PG0, 15.6"LED backlit FHD IPS AntiGlare 1920x1080, GTX 1650 4GB GDDR5, Intel Core i7-9750H Processor, 16.0GB PC4-21300 DDR4 SODIMM SODIMM 2666MHz RAM, 256GB SSD PCIe+1TB 7200 rpm!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1650 in the Lenovo Legion Y545 PG0, 15.6"LED backlit FHD IPS AntiGlare 1920x1080, GTX 1650 4GB GDDR5, Intel Core i7-9750H Processor, 16.0GB PC4-21300 DDR4 SODIMM SODIMM 2666MHz RAM, 256GB SSD PCIe+1TB 7200 rpm is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Starfield. The build quality of the Lenovo Legion Y545 PG0, 15.6"LED backlit FHD IPS AntiGlare 1920x1080, GTX 1650 4GB GDDR5, Intel Core i7-9750H Processor, 16.0GB PC4-21300 DDR4 SODIMM SODIMM 2666MHz RAM, 256GB SSD PCIe+1TB 7200 rpm is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
